column4: hi is there some way to configure launcher in 9.10? im talking about right click on desktop create launcher. is there any config file or something?
hi is there some way to configure launcher in 9.10? im talking about right click on desktop create launcher. is there any config file or something?
There should be a .desktop file that is created in your ~/Desktop
I don't remember if the file is a dotfile, I don't have a graphical system here for me to test on.
